title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2500.14 - Fees and costs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2500.14 - Fees and costs

State Regulations
(a) Preparing
DEIS, EIS and other environmental documents for actions involving applicants. All applicants to the authority shall assume all responsibility and costs
required in the preparation of environmental documents, including draft and
final EIS if the notice of determination so requires. (b) Public hearings, public notices and other
SEQR notices. If the processing of a complete application, prepared by an
applicant, requires public hearings, public notices and other "SEQR notices"
the costs incurred for such activities are the responsibility of the applicant. These costs will include any limited liability insurance required for the
holding of public hearings. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2500.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
